---
title: DUDIT vs ESPAD
---

## DUDIT vs ESPAD

Comparing the Drug Use Disorders Identification Test (DUDIT) and the European School Survey Project on Alcohol and Drugs - Tobacco (ESPAD) can be a complex task, owing to the nature of the different item structures across both instruments. Here is where Harmony, an AI-powered harmonisation tool, comes to the rescue in simplifying the process of comparing these two instruments. The innovative Harmony software is ideal for examining DUDIT vs ESPAD, offering researchers a percentage match between each item in both questionnaires using large language models.

## Compare the items in DUDIT and ESPAD

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIYXMgaXQgaGFwcGVuZWQsIG92ZXIgdGhlIHBhc3QgeWVhciwgdGhhdCB5b3UgaGF2ZSBub3QgYmVlbiBhYmxlIHRvIHN0b3AgdGFraW5nIGRydWdzIG9uY2UgeW91IHN0YXJ0ZWQ_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIb3cgb2Z0ZW4gb3ZlciB0aGUgcGFzdCB5ZWFyIGhhdmUgeW91IHRha2VuIGRydWdzIGFuZCB0aGVuIG5lZ2xlY3RlZCB0byBkbyBzb21ldGhpbmcgeW91IHNob3VsZCBoYXZlIGRvbmU___In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIb3cgbWFueSBjaWdhcmV0dGVzIHBlciBkYXkgZG8geW91IHNtb2tlPyJ9LCB7InF1ZXN0aW9uX3RleHQiOiAiRG8geW91IHNtb2tlIG1vcmUgZnJlcXVlbnRseSBkdXJpbmcgdGhlIGZpcnN0IGhvdXJzIGFmdGVyIHdha2luZyB0aGFuIHRoZSByZXN0IG9mIHRoZSBkYXk_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJEbyB5b3Ugc21va2Ugd2hlbiB5b3UgYXJlIHNvIGlsbCB0aGF0IHlvdSBhcmUgaW4gYmVkIG1vc3Qgb2YgdGhlIGRheT8ifV19XQ==" target="harmonyapp">Import just ESPAD into Harmony</a> - compare ESPAD with other instruments


Harmony offers more than just comparison; it's a valuable platform that allows seamless import of instruments, simplifying the process of data harmonisation. Besides the available instruments in Harmony's database, researchers can easily drag and drop their own instruments in PDF format into the web interface. Whether you're comparing DUDIT and ESPAD or any other correlations, Harmony makes it incredibly straightforward.


{{< card heading="Try Harmony" copy="Compare DUDIT and ESPAD " url="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app" >}}

{{< youtube cEZppTBj1NI >}}

Another impressive feature about Harmony is its multi-language support, ensuring that DUDIT vs ESPAD is possible even across languages. This feature enhances the usability and universality of the tool, enabling it to cater to a more extensive range of researchers. Therefore, for your DUDIT vs ESPAD comparisons, Harmony undoubtedly offers a suitable, streamlined approach that improves not only the accuracy but also the efficiency of the process.
